abstract: So-called Quartet group of powers--United States, European Union, United Nations and Russia--an informal diplomatic group established in 2002 will meet in hopes of finding resolution to Israeli-Palestinian conflict.
lead_paragraph: The United States, the European Union, Russia and the United Nations will convene to seek a resumption of Israeli-Palestinian peace negotiations.
snippet: The United States, the European Union, Russia and the United Nations will convene to seek a resumption of Israeli-Palestinian peace negotiations.

headline.main: U.N. Says Meeting Is Set on Middle East
headline.print_headline: U.N. Says Meeting Is Set on Middle East
